text:
@TomTugendhat I think our own shitty, corrupt govts are already doing that job 🤦‍♀️🙄....each time it's "unprecedented", "a once-in-a-generation-thing" - MERS, SARS, H1N1, Swine Flu, Bird Flu, now Coronavirus - all in the last few decades. 
Last time ppl were starving - 1918 Spanish Flu?! 🤔
